ImplicitFunctionalInterface.description:
Description

Reports functional interfaces that were not explicitly declared as such with
the annotation@FunctionalInterface. If an interface is accidentally a functional
interface, then it should bear a@SuppressWarnings("PMD.ImplicitFunctionalInterface")annotation to make this clear.

Example(s):

Use this rule by referencing it:
ImplicitFunctionalInterface.option: This rule has no specific options.
